data.message: Dear Marshall Mathers I am u bigg3st fan I understand what you went through because I went through the same things as you you are the best I love your music I listen to it every day when I listen to your music I song and rap all the same words people say we are stupid if we are u fans but i dont listen to them because you inspire me and your my aspersion I would love to see you live I would love to be like you and rap and sing my feelings and life but you take the words right out of my mouth you are the best x
